DOC.brief_title: A Study With ASP2151 in Subjects With Recurrent Episodes of Genital Herpes
DOC.criteria: Subject has a history of genital HSV documented by laboratory testing at screening Subject has experienced 4 or more episodes of genital herpes during the past 12 months Subject is immunocompromised
